io.agora.rtc2

Class LocalTranscoderConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.agora.rtc2.LocalTranscoderConfiguration

  • public class LocalTranscoderConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    The configuration of the video mixing on the local client.

    • Field Detail

      • transcodingVideoStreams

        public java.util.ArrayList<LocalTranscoderConfiguration.TranscodingVideoStream> transcodingVideoStreams
        The video streams for the video mixing on the local client. See TranscodingVideoStream.

      • syncWithPrimaryCamera

        public boolean syncWithPrimaryCamera
        Whether to use the timestamp when the primary camera captures the video frame as the timestamp of the mixed video frame. - true: (Default) Use the timestamp of the captured video frame as the timestamp of the mixed video frame. - false: Do not use the timestamp of the captured video frame as the timestamp of the mixed video frame. Instead, use the timestamp when the mixed video frame is constructed.

      • videoOutputConfiguration

        public VideoEncoderConfiguration videoOutputConfiguration
        The encoding configuration of the mixed video stream after the video mixing on the local client. See VideoEncoderConfiguration.

      • LocalTranscoderConfiguration

        public LocalTranscoderConfiguration()
